body.description: Clean & smooth skin is the first step to glowing skin. Get glowing with our Brightening Face Wash! Powered by AHA and Vitamin C, this exfoliating facial cleanser effectively cleanses, exfoliates, helps brighten and even out your skin tone leaving skin refreshed, smooth and RADIANT! Glow baby, glow!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GLOW ALL OUT! You already know and love our Glow Baby Serum, now meet the full glow-inspiring collection. Formulated with our highest concentration of Vitamin C and glycolic acid, this collection is designed to amp up your glow, combat dullness and uneven tone. It's time to reveal your radical radiance!

GLOW ALL OUT! You already know and love our Glow Baby Serum, now meet the full glow-inspiring collection. Formulated with our highest concentration of Vitamin C and glycolic acid, this collection is designed to amp up your glow, combat dullness and uneven tone. It's time to reveal your radical radiance!

Brightening Face Wash The first step to glowing skin is clean & smooth skin! Apply to damp skin, massage in a circular motion. Rinse clean. Brightening Peel Pads Apply to clean, dry face and neck. Massage skin with the embossed side of pad. Do not rinse. Use in the PM before bed, up to 3 times/week. VitaGlow Face Lotion Apply to clean skin. Can be used day or night. If using an AHA treatment, wait 30 minutes to use lotion until after treatment. Super Lit Booster Serum Shake well. Use alone or add a dropper full to your favorite moisturizer anytime you need an extra boost. Apply to clean skin.

Brightening Face Wash Brightening Peel Pads VitaGlow Face Lotion Vitamin C Booster Serum Eye Bright Cream Key Features & Benefits: Our Brightening Face Wash is powered by AHA and Vitamin C to help exfoliate, brighten and even out your skin tone! Helps reveals brighter, more glowing skin Deep cleans pores & improves skin tone & texture Lightweight, non-greasy formula that visibly hydrates & brightens skin & helps to firm skin & reduce signs of photoaging Our best-selling serum has been shown to help improve texture, brighten, and refresh lackluster skin This super-hydrating under-eye cream is formulated with antioxidant-rich vitamin C, caffeine, hyaluronic acid and apple fruit extract to help brighten & depuff tired under-eyes. Skin Type: All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types Ingredients We Love: Vitamin C, AHAs, Vanilla 10% AHA + BHA, Niacinamide, Apple Fruit Extract Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vanilla Extract Vitamin C, Glycolic Acid Vitamin C, Caffeine, Hyaluronic Acid, Apple Fruit Extract Vegan & Cruelty-Free: ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Better Packaging 37% PCR (Post Consumer Recycled) plastic tube 100% Recycled Plastic Glass bottle for less plastic usage Glass bottle for less plastic usage Glass jar for less plastic usage

About Pacifica Beauty Made with Compassion: Pacifica Beauty is an innovative clean beauty company that started a revolution in natural beauty. We are committed to using natural ingredients that are skin beneficial, non-toxic and safe. Our product range includes skin care, color cosmetics, hair care, body and perfume. for the Planet, Nature is our muse. For nearly 25 years, we have strived to do right by our planet, from the ingredients we source to the pretty packages we create. We make it easy for our community to help the environment too. Animals, We have been Cruelty-Free and Vegan since day one. These are not buzzwords for us. We are fearless in our mission to transform beauty by leading with love and compassion. and You! You should not have to choose between effective or clean, beauty or health, self or environment. We create clean products across all categories that are accessible and make you feel beautiful. No need to compromise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: I got a small tube of this face wash in a product trial bundle. After my first use, I ordered one of these regular size tubes because I liked it so muchI have sensitive/finicky skin, so I always proceed with caution when trying new scrubs/washes/moisturizers etc. This stuff doesn't bother me at all, no redness afterwards, no stinging, no excessive dryness, nothingThe scent is really nice, kind of light and perky enough to make you feel a little more awake in the morning - It's sort of sweet/candy-ishThis face wash isn't gritty. It says it's an exfoliate, but has NO grit at all. It still gets the job done well enough on its own, but I DO have to wash twice on particularly sweaty days or days when my hygiene has been lacking ( I'm gross sometimes, I admit :p )This stuff does NOT foam up at all. And it's bright yellow lol which I find uniqueAll in all, I really like it. A tube lasts a while, even though it doesn't look super big. All you need is a dollop on your fingertip, and that's enough to wash your face - A little goes a long way. So, I think it's a good deal. I plan on buying more when I run outAs for the brightening effect - I can't say I really notice a difference. But maybe I just don't pay close enough attention to notice (?)I pair this with the facial lotion from the same Baby Glow line. I really like that stuff too. I also use the Baby Glow peeling pads, and I DO notice a brightening/pore-shrinking difference with those. So, if you like this face wash, you might want to check out the other products in the line

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for everyday use
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled with this face wash! Its gentle yet effective formula leaves my skin feeling refreshed and deeply cleansed without any dryness or irritation. The light, pleasant fragrance adds a soothing touch to my skincare routine. I have noticed a visible reduction in breakouts and blemishes since using this product regularly. Additionally, a little goes a long way, making this face wash an excellent value for its price. It also has an orange tint to it so be careful with your clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells like a Dreamsicle!
reviews.reviewText: Remember those orange and vanilla popsicles? This smells just like it! Unfortunately for me, I don't like that smell. The smell is very potent, in my opinion, which is overwhelming to me. It comes out as a gel and turns to foam. It cleanses well and doesn't clog pores. Personally, I am not a fan of this product as the scent is so strong that it negates the other aspects. However, it works as advertised. I would recommend this product to anyone who is not sensitive to scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great face wash and smells wonderful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super refreshing citrus scent
reviews.reviewText: I love the whole line of Pacifica cleansers for combination skin. This one is perfect for a morning clean. It leaves my skin soft, not stripped or dry. Do not use it however if you have dry skin. It's not an emollient cleansing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not foam up
reviews.reviewText: this is a greasy gel cleaner- I read lots of reviews and my previous Pacifica was a white cream that lathered up and felt great- this does not lather and feels a little greasy on skin. I guess it feels clean when rinsed off but not as much as the foaming/lathering version. I don't overall like the gel versions. I don't feel like I can really scrub or get anything thick off- like eye make up. It does smell like oranges but I would not purchase again. On the never ending search for a non greasy face wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite face cleanser of all time
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best Pacifica creation of all time. Best face cleanser I have ever used. I have problem skin, part oily, part dry, gets flaky from a lot of cleanser or doesn’t feel clean, and used to have to frequent use exfoliating scrubs and masks to get rid of the flakes and unclog pores. Not since I have been using this, which is as long as it has been on the market. Hoping Pacifica never stops making it, but am afraid because they are one of those companies that seem to flip products frequently thinking that they get more sales from the new this and new that. But when you have a great product you get more sales from keeping it on the market as buyers come back and word gets around. As long as they make it, I will keep buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful product for the money. It is gentle and moisturizing and cleans all my makeup right off.
